title: Night Hunter Rengar Hood Bug
body: There is a bug with Rengar's hood on the Night Hunter skin where the hood comes off when he ults its a minor thing that annoys me and I would like to see it fixed.{{champion:107}}

replies.body:
Hey - 

I've had this thread up on my computer for a while 'cause I've been deep diving into what's going on with the hood. 

An animator spent some time looking into how this is hooked up, and from what he's seen, this feature was never implemented. He never had a call for him having the hood on when he ulted. In this case, so this would technically be considered working as intended. This was a new feature brought into the game with Night Hunter Rengar, and the tech was limited. *Tbh, it still is.*

In order to change up the hood, we'd need designer help, and potentially new tech implemented. It isn't a super easy change to make - the animator tried, but it's not something that's purely animation. 

I've tossed this onto our backlog, but it won't be something that's heavily prioritized at this time.
That makes a lot of sense actually, thank you for looking into it and for your time.
